```{r}
A %>% group_by(cut2_5_7) %>% summarise(
    r = mean(r),      # recency 最近一次距今購買天數
    s = mean(s),      # seniority 第一次距今購買天數
    f = n(),            # frquency 總共買幾次    
    m = mean(m),       # monetary 平均購買金額
    rev = mean(rev),   # total revenue contribution 總收益
    raw = mean(raw)   # total gross profit contribution 總毛利
  )     # 33241
```
